text: “Drama” is a song by Italian-Indian singer Janalynn Castelino. The single is Castelino’s debut in the Spanish language. The song was released on 20 September 2024. == Release Background == The song’s genre is pop with Latin style. The song’s lyrics is inspired by Janalynn’s personal expression of emotion in a relationship. == Music video == A music video was released on 18 October 2024 on Castelino's YouTube channel. == References == == Other websites == * Music video on YouTube Category:2024 songs Category:Pop songs Category:Latin pop songs Category:Dance-pop songs
title: Drama (song)
